subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0149_01C9E836.389B2720
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I monitor my audio live. The funny thing is that even so, those last EVP's =
I captured I did not hear either in the environment, or on my recording as =
it happened. I only heard them upon playback.

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Zack Widup 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June=
 08, 2009 11:40 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas






  I am curious =
if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP =
in real time.

  I took part in an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near A=
shmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three =
halls of the building. The video for all was being monitored and recorded a=
t a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera sites=
 conected to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard if we =
did?

  Zack

   
  On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@...=
 <Threadsintyme@...> wrote:


  Let's just agree to end this discussio=
n about her... 
  Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note? Anyone =
have any new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
  Al
